caption.p: Anatomy of A. monosperma stem. ( A) A transverse section in stem, Ep: epidermis, Co: cortex, Lc: lysigenous duct, Sd: schizogenous duct, Vb: vascular bundle; ( B) Druses crystals (Dr); ( C) Prismatic crystals (Pr), Lc: lysigenous duct, Sd: schizogenous duct; ( D) thick wall (Thw), Cu: cuticle, Pi: phenolic idioblasts, Od: oil drops; ( E) enlarged vascular bundle (Vb), Mx: metaxylem, Px: protoxylem, Ph: phloem, Spf: sclerenchymatous pericycle fibers. Bar: A = 40 µm, B–F = 400 µm.
